captions.text:
-Hey, I'm gonna go get
something to drink.
You go out there and shake it.
-I want to shake it with you.

I'm just going to
watch you go.
-You do this to me every time.
You go out there and dance.

What's the matter
with you, huh?

We drove two hours
to get here.

You're just gonna stand
around and mope?

MALE SPEAKER: But it's
country line dancing.
